meanings.sent1: The sender of the letter put it in the mailbox.
meanings.sent2: The sender of the gift was my friend.
meanings.sent3: The sender of the message forgot to sign their name.
meanings.sent4: The sender of the invitation spread joy to all recipients.
meanings.sent5: The sender of the email clicked 'send' eagerly.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that sends a message or package.
meanings.sent1: The sender of the parcel included a lovely note.
meanings.sent2: The sender of the email was the marketing team.
meanings.sent3: The sender of the package used colorful wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: The sender of the text message was unknown.
meanings.sent5: The sender of the letter had neat handwriting.

meanings.definition: The transmitter of a message or signal.
meanings.sent1: The radio tower acts as the sender of the broadcast.
meanings.sent2: The sender of the signal was located in the control room.
meanings.sent3: The sender of the radio waves was a mystery to the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The sender of the transmission ensured clear communication.
meanings.sent5: The sender of the Morse code tapped out a secret message.
